use_cases: ["Genome sequencing using Illumina HiSeq 2000 platform generating 16,059,176 paired-end reads", "Genome assembly using Velvet assembler v1.1.02 achieving 972× coverage", "Protein-coding gene prediction using Glimmer 3.02 with self-training dataset", "tRNA gene prediction using ARAGORN", "rRNA gene prediction using RNAmmer", "Functional annotation of predicted genes using BLASTp against NR database", "Comparative genome analysis with Gluconobacter oxydans 621H", "Identification of paralogous sldAB operons for dihydroxyacetone production", "Identification of NADH dehydrogenase genes and operons", "Analysis of PQQ domain-containing protein repertoires", "Deposition of draft genome sequence to DDBJ/EMBL/GenBank under accession BAON00000000"]
